firstNightReminder: Mark two in-play or two out-of-play characters with the "Carriage ride" tokens. Show the Coachman these two character tokens.
name: Coachman
ability: You start knowing 2 characters: they are either both in-play, or both out-of-play.

firstNightReminder: Mark two players of different character types with the "Checked" reminder tokens. Point to the two players marked with these tokens.
otherNightReminder: If the Border Guard died tonight, point to two players that are different character types.
name: Border Guard
ability: You start knowing 2 players of different character types. If you die at night, you learn another pair.

firstNightReminder: The Bookkeeper chooses 3 characterss: these players are marked with the "Record" tokens.
otherNightReminder: If one of the characters chosen the previous night voted, nod yes, otherwise shake your head no. The Bookkeeper chooses 3 players: these players are marked with the "Record" tokens.
name: Bookkeeper
ability: Each night, choose 3 characters: the following night, you learn if any of them voted.

firstNightReminder: The Pickpocket is shown a player, then shown three tokens, one of which is on that player.
otherNightReminder: The Pickpocket is shown a player, then shown three tokens, one of which is on that player.
name: Pickpocket
ability: Each night, you learn that 1 of 3 reminder tokens is on a particular player. If there are no reminder tokens, you are drunk.

firstNightReminder: Each player who woke due to their own ability is marked with the "Woke" token. Show the Lamplighter the hand signal (0, 1, 2, etc.) for the number of "Woke" tokens.
otherNightReminder: Each player who woke due to their own ability is marked with the "Woke" token. Show the Lamplighter the hand signal (0, 1, 2, etc.) for the number of "Woke" tokens.
name: Lamplighter
ability: Each night, you learn how many players (not yourself) woke due to their own ability.

otherNightReminder: The Host points to any number of players, who are each marked with an "Invited" token. If none of the chosen characters share a character type, they are all marked with the "Protected" token.
name: Host
ability: Each night*, choose any number of players (not yourself): if none of them share a character type, they cannot die tonight.

otherNightReminder: The Witness points at a player: if the chosen player died tonight, show the Witness the token of the character that killed them.
name: Witness
ability: Each night*, choose a player: if they died tonight, you learn which character killed them.

name: Courier
ability: Each day, you may privately visit the Storyteller with a one-phrase topic: You learn a false fact about this topic.

name: Servant
ability: Each day, you may privately visit the Storyteller to receive a task: if you complete the task today, something good happens.

otherNightReminder: If all of the False Prophet's guesses were correct, mark the False Prophet with the "Die" token.
name: False Prophet
ability: Once per game, during the day, publicly guess 3 playersâ€™ character types (not all Townsfolk, not yourself): If all correct, you die tonight.

name: Knoller
ability: Once per game, during the day, you may publicly declare that you are going to ring the bells. If exactly 3 players choose to join you, and exactly 1 of them is evil, you are executed. (If you do not get exactly 3 players to join you, you may repeat this ability.)

otherNightReminder: For as many nights as there were correct guesses, mark a player with the "Die" token.
name: Muckraker
ability: On your first day, you may publicly guess which evil characters are in-play. A player dies each night for each correct guess.

name: Bartender
ability: Your closest Outsider neighbors are drunk. If there are no Outsiders, your closest Minion neighbor is drunk.

firstNightReminder: Place the "Drunk" token by the clockwise Townsfolk neighbor of the Patron.
otherNightReminder: Move the "Drunk" reminder to the next clockwise Townsfolk neighbor.
name: Patron
ability: Each night, your next clockwise Townsfolk neighbor is drunk. If you die by execution, you keep this ability.

otherNightReminder: If both of the Matchmaker's living neighbors are not Townsfolk, mark the Matchmaker with the "Die" token.
name: Matchmaker
ability: Each night*, if both your living neighbors are not both Townsfolk, you die.

name: Chatterbox
ability: Each day, if you do not correctly guess a player's character (no repeats, not yourself), you may be executed.

name: Ventriloquist
ability: Your closest living neighbors may register as good and as the Ventriloquist.

firstNightReminder: The Silhouette points to a player: that player is marked with the "Shadow" token.
otherNightReminder: The Silhouette points to a player: that player is marked with the "Shadow" token.
name: Silhouette
ability: Each night, choose a player: you may register as their character and alignment, and they may register as your character and alignment.

firstNightReminder: The Bloodletter chooses a player: if that player is an Outsider, mark that player with a "Chosen" token.
otherNightReminder: The Bloodletter chooses a player: if that player is an Outsider not marked with the "Chosen" token, they are marked with the "Chosen" token. If they are marked with the "Chosen" token, the Bloodletter chooses a player, who is marked with the "Die" token.
name: Bloodletter
ability: Each night, choose a player: the second time the same Outsider is chosen, choose a player: they die. This ability cannot be triggered off the same player multiple times. [+1 Outsider]

otherNightReminder: If the Reeve is marked with the "Nominated today" token, the Reeve chooses a player, who is marked with the "Die" token.
name: Reeve
ability: Each night*, if you were nominated by another player that day, choose a player: they die.

name: Fearmonger
ability: If a living Outsider is mad about being an Outsider, they may be executed. [+1 Outsider]

firstNightReminder: Wake the Impostor and show them the token of a not-in-play good character. The Impostor has that ability.
otherNightReminder: The Impostor chooses a player: they are marked with the "Die" token.
name: Impostor
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. On your first night, you gain the ability of a not-in-play good character and register as that character. You cannot die due to your own ability. One night, you may register correctly.

otherNightReminder: The Empiric chooses a player: they are marked with the "Die" token. If that player is an Outsider that dies due to the Empiric, a good player is marked with the "Poisoned" token.
name: Empiric
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. If you kill an Outsider, a good player is poisoned. [+1 Outsider]

otherNightReminder: The Basilisk chooses a player: they are marked with the "Die" token. If the Basilisk nods yes and points at a player: if that player is an Outsider, mark that player with the "Die" token and repeat this ability; if that player is not an Outsider, they are not marked.
name: Basilisk
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. You may say the player you are going to kill is an Outsider: if correct, repeat your ability; if incorrect, they survive. [+2 Outsiders]

otherNightReminder: The Nightmare chooses a player: they are marked with the "Die" token. If the Nightmare kills themselves and the majority of living players are not Townsfolk, the Nightmare's team wins.
name: Nightmare
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. If the majority of living players (at least 4) are not Townsfolk and you are executed, your team wins, even if you would lose. [+2 Outsiders]
